verses.verse: And when the queen <WH4436> of Sheba <WH7614> heard <WH8085> of <WH853> the fame <WH8088> of Solomon <WH8010> concerning the name <WH8034> of the LORD, <WH3068> she came <WH935> to prove <WH5254> him with hard questions. <WH2420>

And she came <WH935> to Jerusalem <WH3389> with a very <WH3966> great <WH3515> train, <WH2428> with camels <WH1581> that bore <WH5375> spices, <WH1314> and very <WH3966> much <WH7227> gold, <WH2091> and precious <WH3368> stones: <WH68> and when she was come <WH935> to <WH413> Solomon, <WH8010> she communed <WH1696> with <WH413> him of <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> was <WH1961> in <WH5973> her heart. <WH3824>

And Solomon <WH8010> told <WH5046> her <WH853> all <WH3605> her questions: <WH1697> there was <WH1961> not <WH3808> any thing <WH1697> hid <WH5956> from <WH4480> the king, <WH4428> which <WH834> he told <WH5046> her not. <WH3808>
And when the queen <WH4436> of Sheba <WH7614> had seen <WH7200> <WH853> all <WH3605> Solomon's <WH8010> wisdom, <WH2451> and the house <WH1004> that <WH834> he had built, <WH1129>

And the meat <WH3978> of his table, <WH7979> and the sitting <WH4186> of his servants, <WH5650> and the attendance <WH4612> of his ministers, <WH8334> and their apparel, <WH4403> and his cupbearers, <WH4945> and his ascent <WH5930> by which <WH834> he went up <WH5927> unto the house <WH1004> of the LORD; <WH3068> there was <WH1961> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> spirit <WH7307> in her.

And she said <WH559> to <WH413> the king, <WH4428> It was <WH1961> a true <WH571> report <WH1697> that <WH834> I heard <WH8085> in mine own land <WH776> of <WH5921> thy acts <WH1697> and of <WH5921> thy wisdom. <WH2451>

Howbeit I believed <WH539> not <WH3808> the words, <WH1697> until <WH5704> <WH834> I came, <WH935> and mine eyes <WH5869> had seen <WH7200> it: and, behold, <WH2009> the half <WH2677> was not <WH3808> told <WH5046> me: thy wisdom <WH2451> and prosperity <WH2896> exceedeth <WH3254> <WH413> the fame <WH8052> which <WH834> I heard. <WH8085>

Happy <WH835> are thy men, <WH376> happy <WH835> are these <WH428> thy servants, <WH5650> which stand <WH5975> continually <WH8548> before <WH6440> thee, and that hear <WH8085> <WH853> thy wisdom. <WH2451>

Blessed <WH1288> be <WH1961> the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> which <WH834> delighted <WH2654> in thee, to set <WH5414> thee on <WH5921> the throne <WH3678> of Israel: <WH3478> because the LORD <WH3068> loved <WH157> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> forever, <WH5769> therefore made <WH7760> he thee king, <WH4428> to do <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> and justice. <WH6666>

And she gave <WH5414> the king <WH4428> a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> talents <WH3603> of gold, <WH2091> and of spices <WH1314> very <WH3966> great store, <WH7235> and precious <WH3368> stones: <WH68> there came <WH935> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> such <WH1931> abundance <WH7230> of spices <WH1314> as these which <WH834> the queen <WH4436> of Sheba <WH7614> gave <WH5414> to king <WH4428> Solomon. <WH8010>

And the navy <WH590> also <WH1571> of Hiram, <WH2438> that <WH834> brought <WH5375> gold <WH2091> from Ophir, <WH4480> <WH211> brought in <WH935> from Ophir <WH4480> <WH211> great <WH3966> plenty <WH7235> of almug <WH484> trees, <WH6086> and precious <WH3368> stones. <WH68>

And the king <WH4428> made <WH6213> of <WH853> the almug <WH484> trees <WH6086> pillars <WH4552> for the house <WH1004> of the LORD, <WH3068> and for the king's <WH4428> house, <WH1004> harps <WH3658> also and psalteries <WH5035> for singers: <WH7891> there came <WH935> no <WH3808> such <WH3651> almug <WH484> trees, <WH6086> nor <WH3808> were seen <WH7200> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> gave <WH5414> unto the queen <WH4436> of Sheba <WH7614> <WH853> all <WH3605> her desire, <WH2656> whatsoever <WH834> she asked, <WH7592> beside <WH4480> <WH905> that which <WH834> Solomon <WH8010> gave <WH5414> her of his royal bounty. <WH3027> <WH4428> So she turned <WH6437> and went <WH1980> to her own country, <WH776> she <WH1931> and her servants. <WH5650>

Now the weight <WH4948> of gold <WH2091> that <WH834> came <WH935> to Solomon <WH8010> in one <WH259> year <WH8141> was <WH1961> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> threescore <WH8346> and six <WH8337> talents <WH3603> of gold, <WH2091>

Beside <WH905> that he had of the merchantmen, <WH4480> <WH376> <WH8446> and of the traffic <WH4536> of the spice merchants, <WH7402> and of all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of Arabia, <WH6154> and of the governors <WH6346> of the country. <WH776>

And king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> made <WH6213> two hundred <WH3967> targets <WH6793> of beaten <WH7820> gold: <WH2091> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> shekels of gold <WH2091> went <WH5927> to <WH5921> one <WH259> target. <WH6793>

And he made three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> shields <WH4043> of beaten <WH7820> gold; <WH2091> three <WH7969> pound <WH4488> of gold <WH2091> went <WH5927> to <WH5921> one <WH259> shield: <WH4043> and the king <WH4428> put <WH5414> them in the house <WH1004> of the forest <WH3293> of Lebanon. <WH3844>
Moreover the king <WH4428> made <WH6213> a great <WH1419> throne <WH3678> of ivory, <WH8127> and overlaid <WH6823> it with the best <WH6338> gold. <WH2091>

The throne <WH3678> had six <WH8337> steps, <WH4609> and the top <WH7218> of the throne <WH3678> was round <WH5696> behind: <WH4480> <WH310> and there were stays <WH3027> on either side <WH4480> <WH2088> <WH4480> <WH2088> on <WH413> the place <WH4725> of the seat, <WH7675> and two <WH8147> lions <WH738> stood <WH5975> beside <WH681> the stays. <WH3027>

And twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> lions <WH738> stood <WH5975> there <WH8033> on <WH5921> the one side <WH4480> <WH2088> and on the other <WH4480> <WH2088> upon the six <WH8337> steps: <WH4609> there was not <WH3808> the like <WH3651> made <WH6213> in any <WH3605> kingdom. <WH4467>

And all <WH3605> king <WH4428> Solomon's <WH8010> drinking <WH4945> vessels <WH3627> were of gold, <WH2091> and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> of the house <WH1004> of the forest <WH3293> of Lebanon <WH3844> were of pure <WH5462> gold; <WH2091> none <WH369> were of silver: <WH3701> it was nothing <WH3808> <WH3972> accounted <WH2803> of in the days <WH3117> of Solomon. <WH8010>

For <WH3588> the king <WH4428> had at sea <WH3220> a navy <WH590> of Tharshish <WH8659> with <WH5973> the navy <WH590> of Hiram: <WH2438> once <WH259> in three <WH7969> years <WH8141> came <WH935> the navy <WH590> of Tharshish, <WH8659> bringing <WH5375> gold, <WH2091> and silver, <WH3701> ivory, <WH8143> and apes, <WH6971> and peacocks. <WH8500>
So king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> exceeded all <WH1431> <WH4480> <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> for riches <WH6239> and for wisdom. <WH2451>

And all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> sought <WH1245> <WH853> to <WH6440> Solomon, <WH8010> to hear <WH8085> <WH853> his wisdom, <WH2451> which <WH834> God <WH430> had put <WH5414> in his heart. <WH3820>

And they <WH1992> brought <WH935> every man <WH376> his present, <WH4503> vessels <WH3627> of silver, <WH3701> and vessels <WH3627> of gold, <WH2091> and garments, <WH8008> and armor, <WH5402> and spices, <WH1314> horses, <WH5483> and mules, <WH6505> a rate <WH1697> year <WH8141> by year. <WH8141>

And Solomon <WH8010> gathered together <WH622> chariots <WH7393> and horsemen: <WH6571> and he had <WH1961> a thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> chariots, <WH7393> and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> horsemen, <WH6571> whom he bestowed <WH5148> in the cities <WH5892> for chariots, <WH7393> and with <WH5973> the king <WH4428> at Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And the king <WH4428> made <WH5414> <WH853> silver <WH3701> to be in Jerusalem <WH3389> as stones, <WH68> and cedars <WH730> made <WH5414> he to be as the sycamore trees <WH8256> that <WH834> are in the vale, <WH8219> for abundance. <WH7230>

And Solomon <WH8010> had horses <WH5483> brought <WH4161> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> and linen yarn: <WH4480> <WH4723> the king's <WH4428> merchants <WH5503> received <WH3947> the linen yarn <WH4480> <WH4723> at a price. <WH4242>

And a chariot <WH4818> came up <WH5927> and went out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4480> <WH4714> for six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> shekels of silver, <WH3701> and a horse <WH5483> for a hundred <WH3967> and fifty: <WH2572> and so <WH3651> for all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the Hittites, <WH2850> and for the kings <WH4428> of Syria, <WH758> did they bring them out <WH3318> by their means. <WH3027>
